explanation: [0-0] The frame is divided into three sections. The upper and lower parts show a blurred gray interface. In the middle section, against a white wall, a red vehicle with only one front wheel is placed on the ground, its wheel mounted on a black metal stand. There is an elongated fuel tank above the vehicle, with handlebars at the front and a seat at the rear. On the left, a person wearing a red shirt is holding the handlebars with their right hand and the seat with their left hand.
[0-2] The person on the left steps forward, placing their right foot on the vehicle and pressing down on the gear lever, starting the vehicle.
[0-2] The person on the left steps forward, placing their right foot on the vehicle and pressing down on the gear lever, starting the vehicle.

[2-10] The person then turns the handlebars with their hands, slowly turning the vehicle to face the front of the frame. They then press the horn on top of the vehicle a few times with their left hand.
